message:
Education is imperative. If law makers understood sex trafficking, legalizing prostitution wouldn’t be part of any conversation in our opinion. 
“A lot of people are under the misconception that just because it’s legal [in Nevada ], then it’s safe.”

data.description: State lawmakers pushing to legalize prostitution may want to think twice. A former sex-trade survivor who says she was victimized everywhere from New York City strip clubs to Nevada’s legal brothel…
data.title: Sex-trade survivor: Don’t legalize prostitution in New York
